transcripts.text: Hi family, how you doing?  Happy 4th of July.  We live in a great nation, don't we?  Red, white, and blue.  This is called a lava lava.  I heard what I wanted to hear.  Now I'm gonna go and celebrate with one of the largest fireworks ever here in the Bayou.  It's a rainbow.  And within the East, I want you to see the West.  Love you.  Bye-bye.
